Type.Name: GException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GException extends System.Exception

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Exception emitted by GError receipt from native methods.
Docs.remarks: When a native method takes a GError parameter to report failures in method invocation, if the GError parameter is set after method invocation this Exception is thrown to report the error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int errptr) cil managed

Docs.param: a handle to the native GError pointer.
Docs.remarks: This constructor is public so that generated code in assemblies outside of glib-sharp.dll can access it, but it should not be necessary to use it from application code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed
